structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Interlocutory Judgments And Decrees; Revision On Appeal From Final Judgments Or Decrees
law.text: Interlocutory judgments and decrees not appealed from shall be open to revision upon appeals from final judgments and decrees so far only as it appears to the appeals court or supreme judicial court that such final judgments and decrees are erroneously affected thereby.
